#text=Every day I wash myself in one form or another .
#text=It is imperative to stay clean and hygienic .
#text=Last night I decided to switch up my normal routine of taking a shower , and decided to take a nice bubble bath !
#text=To prepare for the luscious endeavor , I stopped at LUSH on my way home from work .
#text=LUSH has a variety of ` bath bombs ' that can be used to enhance a bath .
#text=I found a dragonfruit-passionberry bomb , and purchased it .
#text=Although I am a straight man , I love to pamper myself .
#text=Getting home , the first thing I did was turn the hot water on in the bath to fill it up .
#text=The warm water filled the tub and tendrils of mist rose from the steamy water .
#text=I dropped the bath bomb in and stepped into the tub myself .
#text=Lowering myself slowly into the water 's embrace , I relaxed fully .
#text=After spending 20 minutes and becoming a pruny mass , my bath was complete and my whole persona was now clean .
